title: Why did i get a free win in my next series?

replies.body: cuz riot wants players to stop bitching so they basically added a useless feature that can cheese players a tiny bit higher for a little bit.

> [{quoted}](name=tonzillacrayon,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=hnEvJehA,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-01-29T07:25:44.730+0000)
>
> cuz riot wants players to stop bitching so they basically added a useless feature that can cheese players a tiny bit higher for a little bit.

makes sense.

Promo helper added late season 5 and it is due to being demoted or losing your promos gusty wrong when you get back into the set promos you failed or demoted from you will get a free win up to gold 2 where it stops.

Edit: have no idea how to fix that sentence spell correct more op than graves
TL:DR: gives you extra win for losing promos or demotions and getting back into promos for the set tier you were demoted from.

> [{quoted}](name=Sakura Mirage,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=hnEvJehA,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-01-29T07:22:15.004+0000)
>
> Promo helper added late season 5 and it is due to being demoted or losing your promos gusty wrong when you get back into the set promos you failed or demoted from you will get a free win up to gold 2 where it stops.

Like i had 3 people go afk in my series does that help it too?
